blogPost.excerpt: Host Notes takes your plain Clubhouse event and transforms it into an event super-space. Collect RSVPs, collect tips, set an agenda, establish event rules, share relevant links and so much more all in a single click.
blogPost.body: Host Notes takes your plain Clubhouse event and transforms it into an event super-space. Collect RSVPs, collect tips, set an agenda, establish event rules, share relevant links and so much more all in a single click.
blogPost.title: Host Notes for Clubhouse - Take your Clubhouse events to the next level ⚡
blogPost.author: Tim Carambat

localize.description: 主持人笔记将你的普通会所活动转化为一个超级活动空间。收集RSVP，收集提示，设置议程，建立活动规则，分享相关链接等等，所有这些都只需点击一下。
localize.tagline: 让您的会所活动更上一层楼 ⚡

localize.description: 主持人筆記將你的普通會所活動轉化爲一個超級活動空間。收集RSVP，收集提示，設置議程，建立活動規則，分享相關鏈接等等，所有這些都只需點擊一下。
localize.tagline: 讓您的會所活動更上一層樓 ⚡

previous.title:
At $7.69 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.5 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl

localize.full_text:
7.69万亿美元，美联储资产负债表本周再创新高。

自2020年初以来，美联储的总资产已经增加了3.5万亿美元，他们承诺未来将以每月1200亿美元的速度继续购买债券。https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl。

7.69萬億美元，美聯儲資產負債表本週再創新高。

自2020年初以來，美聯儲的總資產已經增加了3.5萬億美元，他們承諾未來將以每月1200億美元的速度繼續購買債券。https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl。

next.excerpt: Most live video products are built for an adult-first corporate world not for kids and learning. Prisma LIVE is a new, fun and engaging way for kids to learn and collaborate together virtually.
next.title: Prisma LIVE - A live learning platform purpose-built for kids

localize.description: 大多数视频直播产品都是为成人优先的企业世界打造的，而不是为孩子和学习而打造的。Prisma LIVE是一种全新的、有趣的、吸引孩子们一起虚拟学习和协作的方式。
localize.tagline: 专为孩子们打造的直播学习平台。

localize.description: 大多數視頻直播產品都是爲成人優先的企業世界打造的，而不是爲孩子和學習而打造的。Prisma LIVE是一種全新的、有趣的、吸引孩子們一起虛擬學習和協作的方式。
localize.tagline: 專爲孩子們打造的直播學習平臺。
